item.title: Project Proposal: Identifying Neighbourhoods with Childhood Developmental Risk through Geospatial Analysis of Built Spaces
item.description: Project Motivation Project Objective Literature Review Reviewing Research on Relationship Between Built Environment and Child Development Literature Review 1: Relationship Between the Neighbourhood Built Environment and Early Child Development Literature Review 2: Levels of Influence in the Built Environment on the Promotion of Healthy Child Development Reviewing Research on Accessibility Analysis Literature Review 1: Accessibility analysis (Concepts and their application to transport policy, programme and project evaluation) Literature Review 2: How Accessibility Shapes Land Use Methodology Application Design Storyboard Interactive Maps Data Explorer Application System Architecture Data Challenges and Mitigation Scope of Work Task Completion List Project Motivation Children are the future of a nationâ€™s well-being.
